scripts.build: preact build --template src/template.html --no-prerender --dest docs && git add docs
scripts.ghpages: npm run -s build && git add . && cross-env-shell git commit -m "$npm_package_version" && git push && cross-env-shell hub release create -m "$npm_package_version" "$npm_package_version" && cross-env-shell sentry-cli releases set-commits "$npm_package_version" --auto && cross-env-shell sentry-cli releases deploys "$npm_package_version" new --env production -n "gh-pages"
